comments.content:
If you have processed your sample image in any way, would you please upload the original?  
(it could be more helpful)
And any information about the source (year and country) also would be helpful....
5star, is this a cap from a video? A printed piece? The quality isn't sufficient for a visual database search, so if you have a URL, please share.
Sorry that's all I have, my eyes are bleeding from searching dafont... thanks for the try!

The original, in case anyone still wants to take a crack at it:  
 [http://chuva.cancao-efemera.net/](http://web.archive.org/web/20150414143337/http:/chuva.cancao-efemera.net/ "http://chuva.cancao-efemera.net/")

5star, you may just have to email the webmaster of the site and ask them directly.
